div:
The Case Report Submitter is responsible for submitting a case report to a Case Report Transformer. There are three options for the Submit Case Report transaction that a Case Reporter may use for submission of case reports depending on their maturity levels.
The Case Report Submitter may choose between three options for the transaction depending on its maturity level. These three options allow for the following type of input:
tabular data in a CSV format with a header row.
Questionnaire
Composition
Note that in the case of submission of tabular data, a ConceptMap must be defined to map the names of the headers to the Questtionaire item.
